name: Tumblr - Doctor Who Post Count/Followers/Drafts
description:
If you're a Whovian this is definitely for you. Track how many 'Plants you've saved' and 'Companions' you've acquired as well as how many 'Black holes' you're collecting because we all know that drafts are really black holes.

Post Count = Planets Saved
Followers = Companions
Drafts = Black holes
